name: Purple Box Escapes Robots
description:
Use momentum from jumping and falling to reach the button, open up the portal, and escape the room!

The robots, however, don't want you to leave...

Use the left and right arrow keys (or A and D) to move left and right.
Press space to jump.

How did you do? Let us know in the comments! All feedback is appreciated!

If you are interested in acquiring a non-exclusive license to feature this game on your platform, please contact us at sales@teambroodrooster.com
